divs: Sighting DetailsWe were returning from a soccer game at Foxboro stadium in Foxboro,MA.I turnedright at the fork on I93north that leads to Boston. About 5 milesdown the road Inotices a triangle object float across the highway fromeast to west. My friendwho was sitting next to me in the passenger seat was adjusting the radio. I gothis attention to look up out the front car window. I asked him if that was aairplane? He said I dont this so!.I said to not lose it just follow it with oureyes. The triangle objectpassed over the highway and hovered and turned around.The three lights thatwere there became two and then it just disappeared.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Foxborough
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Saw a triagle that moved slowly and vanished.
